text: Jean-Luc Dehaene ( 7 August 1940 â€“ 15 May 2014), nicknamed "The Plumber" or "The Minesweeper", was a Belgian politician. He served as Prime Minister of Belgium from 1992 until 1999. He was also mayor of Vilvoorde. Dehaene, who had been suffering from pancreatic cancer, died after a fall while in France, aged 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Belgian mayors Category:Belgian Roman Catholics Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams politicians Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:MEPs for Belgium Category:Politicians from Montpellier Category:Prime ministers of Belgium
title: Jean-Luc Dehaene
